name: Artificial Mansion
description: When Reuben inherits his uncle's mansion, the last thing he expects is to find are sentient life-sized dolls that are capable of moving and talking. As if that isn't shocking enough, one of the dolls is a psychopathic killer who has her sights set on him! Will he survive or become another victim?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Pentium 4 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
